Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to make the "exit fullscreen" bar disappear on the windows version? I'm using this for a uni presentation and it's so ugly :(
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to make the "exit fullscreen" bar disappear on the windows version? I'm using this for a uni presentation and it's so ugly :(

Posts.EditableText: I've not tried the Windows version. But if you can't get what you want, you could always use the web version and hit F11 for fullscreen.
Posts.HTML: I've not tried the Windows version. But if you can't get what you want, you could always use the web version and hit F11 for fullscreen.
